dcterms:description: A large-scale clinical trial comparing low-dose computed tomography (LDCT) with chest radiography for lung cancer screening in over 50,000 current or former smokers.
dcterms:title: National Lung Screening Trial (NLST)

dcterms:description: Study examining the association of coronary artery calcification (CAC) with mortality in the NLST, comparing three different scoring methods.
dcterms:title: Coronary Artery Calcium (CAC) scoring methods

dcterms:description: Method for quantifying coronary artery calcium using ultrafast computed tomography, providing a scoring system for assessing cardiovascular risk.
dcterms:title: Agatston score

dcterms:description: A volumetric method for scoring coronary artery disease that improves reproducibility of calcium scoring using electron-beam CT.

dcterms:description: An analytic method for evaluating changes in coronary artery calcium that accounts for interscan variability.
dcterms:title: Square root of volume score
